description:
Key lessons, tips and techniques to Build a Successful YouTube Channel

You create great content

I teach you how to publish it!

I will teach you how to treat YouTube as a Social Network and how that will generate fans, engagement and real growth!

Is this you?

You create great content

You know there is an audience for your content

You want to share your content

Your Content DESERVES an AUDIENCE!

but!

Growing an audience is hard!

You don't want to 'beg" for views, for likes, or for subscribers

You are not seeing growth in your channel

You see other channels grow and wonder why they have success, but not you?
title: Growing Your YouTube Channel
